name: letterblack-gen-ai
description: AI Generation Extension for Adobe After Effects

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-to-build
scripts.start: echo 'Open Adobe After Effects and load the extension'
scripts.test-security: echo 'Open src/index.html in browser and check console for security tests'
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* || rm -rf build/* || echo 'Build directory cleaned'
scripts.copy-to-build: cp -r src/* build/ || xcopy src build\ /E /I /Y
scripts.copy-to-cep: echo 'Copy build/* to your CEP extensions folder'
scripts.archive: echo 'Creating backup...' && cp -r . ../Adobe_AI_Generations_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d) || echo 'Manual backup recommended'

author: pravesh.pandey@letterblack.ae
